meanings.definition: A kick of a ball that is not executed correctly.
meanings.sent1: During the game, his miskick caused the ball to go in the wrong direction.
meanings.sent2: The player's miskick led to a goal for the opposing team.
meanings.sent3: His miskick was so off-target, it almost hit the referee!
meanings.sent4: The miskick was like a dance move gone wrong on the soccer field.
meanings.sent5: The loud thud of the miskick echoed across the stadium.

meanings.sent1: She tends to miskick when she's nervous during the game.
meanings.sent2: Try not to miskick the ball when you take the penalty shot.
meanings.sent3: He miskicked the ball so badly that it went out of bounds.
meanings.sent4: The player's frustration caused him to miskick the ball repeatedly.
meanings.sent5: The coach reminded the team not to miskick under pressure.
